name: Unnamed Custom Campaign
description:
In this campaign, you will play as Caporal Galm, a simple marine trying to do his job but always got the worst missions. The confederacy requests you to assist the Captain Hale with his excavation assignment, but there is something they have'nt said to him, you will find out soon that the confederacy aren't the ones you think they are.
Author : Fredypimp
author: _ForgeUser8352500
